name: Sword of Nuada
shortDescription: Claoimh Solais - The Sword of Light From Which None Could Escape
fullDescription:
Claoimh Solais - The Sword of Light From Which None Could Escape The Sword of Nuada, known as Claoimh Solais (the "Sword of Light"), is one of the Four
                    Treasures of the Tuatha De Danann. Brought from the mythical city of Findias when the
                    Tuatha De Danann came to Ireland, this sword was the weapon of their first king, Nuada
                    Airgetlam ("Silver Hand").

properties.name: Owner
properties.value: Nuada Airgetlam (Nuada of the Silver Hand)

properties.name: Origin
properties.value: City of Findias in the Otherworld

properties.name: Primary Power
properties.value: None could escape once it was drawn
